product_description: ZICOTO’s Clipboard Folio Is Here to Streamline Your Day with Smart, Effortless Organization! ZICOTO’s cute clipboard folio - your new go-to for smooth and efficient workdays. The chic 12.8x9.37x0.76” clipboard folder is the ultimate blend of practicality and elegance, designed to keep everything you need in one place - whether you're at a meeting, in class or managing your daily tasks. Forget juggling multiple items - the sleek clipboard with notepad has got you covered. The sturdy, hardcover design is built for longevity, while the metal clip secures your standard letter-sized papers, so you can take notes and carry important documents without worry.Inside, you'll find an interior pocket perfect for stashing extra papers, receipts or even business cards, ensuring you're always ready for anything that comes your way. Plus, there’s a handy pen loop (pen not included), so your writing tool is always within reach, never lost in the abyss of your bag. The clipboard folder is equipped with a notebook or legal pad holder - perfect for jotting down quick notes, ideas or to-do lists without running out of space. The notepad, measuring 8.5x11”, has 40 perforated sheets, so you can easily tear off a page when you need to pass on important notes or ideas. And because it’s not glued, you can swap in a fresh clipboard notebook whenever you need one - talk about convenience! With its modern color and delicate gold floral accents, the clipfolio adds a touch of class to your desk or workspace. Whether you're a professional, student or just someone who loves staying organized, ZICOTO’s clipboard folio keeps things organized with a stylish twist. So, organize with confidence
